Class DbusHelper

java.lang.Object
com.welie.blessed.bluez.DbusHelper
public final class DbusHelper
extends java.lang.Object
Various DBUS related helper methods.

  • Method Details

    • findNodes

      public static java.util.Set<java.lang.String> findNodes​(org.freedesktop.dbus.connections.impl.DBusConnection _connection, java.lang.String _path)
      Find all <node>-Elements in DBUS Introspection XML and extracts the value of the 'name' attribute.
      Parameters:
      _connection - the dbus connection
      _path - dbus-path-to-introspect
      Returns:
      Set of String, maybe empty but never null

    • getRemoteObject

      public static <T extends org.freedesktop.dbus.interfaces.DBusInterface> T getRemoteObject​(org.freedesktop.dbus.connections.impl.DBusConnection _connection, java.lang.String _path, java.lang.Class<T> _objClass)
      Creates an java object from a bluez dbus response.
      Type Parameters:
      T - some class/interface implementing/extending DBusInterface
      Parameters:
      _connection - Dbus connection to use
      _path - dbus request path
      _objClass - interface class to use
      Returns:
      the created object or null on error
